comments:
Tested on Eclipse 3.1 RC3 + cdt 3.0 build I200506270955 


Use New C++ Class dialog to create a new class for a std make cpp project. 
After "finish", a error message will pop up and a NPE will be generated as 
following. Works fine on mgd project.

James. I'm unable to reproduce this, how did you manager to get it ?
Was there something special about the project ?
was it a linked project, a different location ?

More details please.

Created an attachment (id=26645)
sample project and error log.

sample project and error log.

I am having the same problem.  I have attached a zip file that contains a
project that should generate the error when attempting to create a new class
using the wizard.  The zip also contains a snippet from the .log error, that is
similar, but different than the one in the original report.

I am using eclipse-3.1 and org.eclipse.cdt-3.0.0-win32.

I am going to assume this is a duplicate of 118887 which occured when you tried to create a new class with the project as the source folder when it wasn't really a source folder.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 118887 ***
